summary.para: Provides data for calls to when the feature specified is . Retrieves the list of video extension command parameters for the specified parameter stage.
The unique identifier for the video extension command for which parameters are retrieved.
A member of the enumeration specifying the parameter stage for which the parameters are retrieved.
The supported number of video extension command parameters. This value must be the count returned by a call to with specified as the feature.
Receives a list of structures describing video extension command parameters.
